comments.author: DarkSpirit.7046
comments.body:
I have not tested them but I think these are the ones.

var eventIdToCheck = “9752677E-FAE7-4F56-A48A-275329095B8A”; // “Hold the Infinity Coil.” – CoE

var eventIdToCheck = “A1182080-2599-4ACC-918E-A3275610602B”; // “Hold the Gates of Flame against waves of Flame Legion.” – CoF

comments.author: Minizinger.7156
comments.body: Hey, I want to make overlay which will check server where CoE/CoF isn’t contested, like this site doing. But I didn’t find how to find it in API. Maybe anyone know which events I should check for it? Thank you.
